Klant: Understood, thank you, Torca. But I really should have stayed in tha=
t battle longer than I did...
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: Allor=
an2@... 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Monday, February 05, 200=
1 7:36 AM
  Subject: Torca's gift


  :::Torca/Ratchet::: 

  ::he sees Kla=
nt:: 
  Torca: Klant, quit putting yourself down like that, you get better =
soon. And 
  thats why i have this for you. 
  ::He hands him a gun that lo=
oks just like his own dorsal gun:: 
  Torca: This baby can fire any kind of=
 artillary you want, it'll probably give 
  you an edge in battle. But reme=
mber something: It is just a weapon.  The 
  warrior who uses it is more im=
portant. Understand what im saying? 
  ~~~~~ 
  ::Ratchet had a deep frown =
on his face:: 
  Ratchet: Well, together we can fix it. Rhinox, mind lettin=
g me help? 
        Yahoo! Groups Sponsor
